Sleep Text: Quality sleep is crucial for maximum muscle growth, top overall health, and peak athletic performance.
Training Text: Training helps your body grow stronger, faster, and more resilient. There are many great ways to work out.
Eating lots of low starch vegetables: Eating lots of low starch vegetables.
Eating a small amount of starchy foods: Eating a small amount of starchy foods.
Eating little to no added sugar: Eating little to no added sugar.
Vitamins, especially those difficult to get on a vegan diet: B12, Vitamin D, Iron, Calcium, and Iodine.
Amino Acids: Lysine and Leucine helps the body more fully utilize seed protein to synthesize muscle.
Creatine: to help your muscles make energy faster and recover better.
DHA & EPA Omega 3s (Usually in the form of fish oil, krill oil, or cod liver oil).
Sleep in a cool, dark room: Sleep in a cool, dark room.
